head.title: Three Discounters Open New Air Routes

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Manufacturing, Operations and Logistics
Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Hospitality, Restaurant and Travel

hedline.hl1: Three Discounters Open New Air Routes

abstract.p: AirTran will introduce new service between Atlanta and Toledo; JetBlue will offer flights from New York City to West Palm Beach; National Airlines will begin flights to Washington from Las Vegas (S)

block.p: Three discount airlines are establishing new routes this autumn -- AirTran Airways is adding service to Toledo, Ohio, from its hub in Atlanta; JetBlue Airways is expanding its service between Kennedy International Airport and Florida; and the Las Vegas-based National Airlines will begin flying to Ronald Reagan National Airport in Washington.

AirTran, (800) 247-8726 or www.airtran .com on the Web, is introducing service between Atlanta and Toledo on Oct. 3 with three daily nonstops using DC-9 jets. A one-way ticket starts at $79 if purchased 14 days in advance.

Three discount airlines are establishing new routes this autumn -- AirTran Airways is adding service to Toledo, Ohio, from its hub in Atlanta; JetBlue Airways is expanding its service between Kennedy International Airport and Florida; and the Las Vegas-based National Airlines will begin flying to Ronald Reagan National Airport in Washington.

AirTran, (800) 247-8726 or www.airtran .com on the Web, is introducing service between Atlanta and Toledo on Oct. 3 with three daily nonstops using DC-9 jets. A one-way ticket starts at $79 if purchased 14 days in advance.

Beginning Oct. 18, JetBlue, (800) 538-2583 or www.jetblue.com, will offer daily flights from Kennedy Airport to West Palm Beach, Fla., aboard Airbus A320's. On Nov. 18, that service will increase to twice a day, and a daily flight to Fort Myers, Fla., will begin. A one-way ticket for either destination starts at $79 14 days in advance.

National Airlines, (888) 757-5387 or www.nationalairlines.com on the Web, will begin offering daily nonstop flights on Boeing 757's to Ronald Reagan National Airport in Washington from Las Vegas on Oct. 26. The 14-day advance round-trip fare starts at $328.
